request.title: Ngfirewall Feature Schema
request.description: ngfirewall profile feature schema for POST request

items.description: Mustn't contain non standard unicode characters
Mustn't contain non standard unicode characters

actions.description: can be empty array or with type or parameter

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for ngfirewall profile feature
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
